org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact

Class AbstractArtifactManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.AbstractArtifactManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArtifactManager, ShutdownHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultArtifactManager

    public abstract class AbstractArtifactManager
extends Object
implements ArtifactManager
    Base implementation of the ArtifactManager interface.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

      • loadArtifactMetadata

        public final void loadArtifactMetadata(@Nonnull
                                       Injector<?> injector)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Reads the artifacts definitions file from the classpath.

        Should call initialize() on artifact handlers if there are any registered already.

        Specified by:
        loadArtifactMetadata in interface ArtifactManager

      • newInstance

        @Nonnull
public <A extends GriffonArtifact> A newInstance(@Nonnull
                                                          GriffonClass griffonClass)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Creates a new instance of the specified class and type.
        Triggers the ApplicationEvent.NEW_INSTANCE with the following parameters
        • clazz - the Class of the object
        • instance -> the object that was created
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface ArtifactManager
        Parameters:
        griffonClass - the GriffonClass for which an instance must be created
        Returns:
        a newly instantiated object of type clazz. Implementations must be sure to trigger an event of type ApplicationEvent.NEW_INSTANCE.

      • findGriffonClass

        @Nullable
public GriffonClass findGriffonClass(@Nonnull
                                               String name,
                                               @Nonnull
                                               String type)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Finds an artifact by name and type.

        Example: findGriffonClass("Book", "controller") will return an artifact class that describes BookController.

        Specified by:
        findGriffonClass in interface ArtifactManager
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the artifact, e.g. 'Book'
        type - the type of the artifact, e.g. 'controller'
        Returns:
        the GriffonClass associated with the artifact is there's a match, null otherwise.

      • findGriffonClass

        @Nullable
public GriffonClass findGriffonClass(@Nonnull
                                               Class<? extends GriffonArtifact> clazz,
                                               @Nonnull
                                               String type)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Finds an artifact by class and type.

        Example: findGriffonClass(BookController, "controller") will return an artifact class that describes BookController.

        Specified by:
        findGriffonClass in interface ArtifactManager
        Parameters:
        clazz - the name of the artifact, e.g. com.acme.BookController
        type - the type of the artifact, e.g. 'controller'
        Returns:
        the GriffonClass associated with the artifact is there's a match, null otherwise.

      • findGriffonClass

        @Nullable
public <A extends GriffonArtifact> GriffonClass findGriffonClass(@Nonnull
                                                                           A artifact)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Finds an artifact by class.

        Example: findGriffonClass(aBookControllerInstance) will return an artifact class that describes BookController.

        Specified by:
        findGriffonClass in interface ArtifactManager
        Parameters:
        artifact - an artifact instance
        Returns:
        the GriffonClass associated with the artifact is there's a match, null otherwise.

public GriffonClass findGriffonClass(@Nonnull

        Example: findGriffonClass("BookController") will return an artifact class that describes BookController.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getClassesOfType

        @Nonnull
public List<GriffonClass> getClassesOfType(@Nonnull
                                                    String type)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Finds all artifacts of an specific type.

        Example: getClassesOfType("controller") will return all artifact classes that describe controllers.

        Specified by:
        getClassesOfType in interface ArtifactManager
        Parameters:
        type - an artifact type, e.g. 'controller'
        Returns:
        a List of matching artifacts or an empty List if no match. Never returns null.

      • getAllClasses

        @Nonnull
public List<GriffonClass> getAllClasses()
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactManager
        Finds all artifact classes.

        Specified by:
        getAllClasses in interface ArtifactManager
        Returns:
        a List of all available GriffonClass instances. Never returns null.

      • canShutdown

        public boolean canShutdown(@Nonnull
                           GriffonApplication application)
        Description copied from interface: ShutdownHandler
        Asks this handler if the application's shutdown sequence can proceed or not.

        Return false if the shutdown sequence must be aborted.

        Specified by:
        canShutdown in interface ShutdownHandler
        Parameters:
        application - the current running application
        Returns:
        true if the shutdown sequence can proceed, false otherwise
